sentences.en: A dictionary explains words and an encyclopedia explains facts.
sentences.cn: 字典解释词而百科全书解释事实.
百科全书的内容涉及许多科目.

sentences.en: An encyclopedia is a well of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 百科全书是知识的源泉.

sentences.en: Geoff is a walking encyclopedia. He knows about everything.
sentences.cn: 杰夫是个活百科全书, 他什么都懂.

sentences.en: Here are two odd volumes of an encyclopedia.
sentences.cn: 这儿有两卷零散的百科全书.

sentences.en: I bought the encyclopedia on a whim.
sentences.cn: 我凭一时的兴致买了这本百科全书.

sentences.en: The child's essay was copied word for word out of an encyclopedia.
sentences.cn: 那孩子的文章是从百科全书一字不变地照抄来的.

sentences.en: The encyclopedia fell to the floor with a thud.
sentences.cn: 那本百科全书砰的一声掉到地上.

sentences.en: The Encyclopedia is packed with clear illustrations and over 250 recipes.
sentences.cn: 那本百科全书有很多清晰的插图和250多个食谱。

sentences.en: The new edition of the encyclopedia embodies many improvements.
sentences.cn: 百科全书的新版本有许多改进之处.

sentences.en: There are 24 volumes of an encyclopedia on a bookshelf.
sentences.cn: 书架上有一套24册的百科全书.

sentences.en: This encyclopedia is crammed with information about everything under the sun.
sentences.cn: 这部百科全书拥有世上一切知识.

sentences.en: Why did you put the volumes of the encyclopedia in haphazard order?
sentences.cn: 你为何把这套百科全书放得杂乱无章?

sentences.en: Why don't you look it up in the encyclopedia?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不去查百科全书?

sentences.en: You will find the explanation in the encyclopedia.
sentences.cn: 你可以在百科全书中找到解释.

words.tran_cn: 百科全书的；广博的；如百科辞典的
百科全书的知识；广博知识

trans.tran_en: a book or cd, or a set of these, containing facts about many different subjects, or containing detailed facts about one subject
